text: puokke ban niyeay tha tae anak ban mokkan puok yeung daembi bangver puok yeung chenhpi( karkorp sakkar) preah neanea robsa puok yeung ryy? dau che neah chaur anak neamk aoy puok yeung nouv avei( tearounakamm) del anak sanyea cheamuoy puok yeung mk brasenbae anak sthet knongchamnaom anak del niyeay pitmen noh
